SetupTraits.Name: Monsters
SetupTraits.Description: Most relict are mindless husks. Their more intelligent masters usually have more complex motivations.

ListedItems.Name: Motivations
ListedItems.Description: Relict are usually dormant, but become active when their tomb-cities are intruded upon by unlucky treasure-seekers. They can also be stirred into wakefulness by the priests of the Black Sun, whose only goal is the reawakening of the old empire, the resurrection of the Arkenlords, and the reconquest and total subjugation of the world of the living.
